data.title: Marianna, Florida Population 2024
data.text:
Marianna is a city located in Calhoun County and Jackson County Florida. Marianna has a 2024 population of 7,630. It is also the county seat of Jackson County. Marianna is currently growing at a rate of 4.61% annually and its population has increased by 21.4% since the most recent census, which recorded a population of 6,285 in 2020.

The average household income in Marianna is $42,654 with a poverty rate of 33.63% . The median age in Marianna is 38.2 years: 36.5 years for males, and 41.2 years for females.

Marianna Demographics

According to the most recent ACS, the racial composition of Marianna was:

Black or African American : 49.8%

White : 47.13%

Two or more races : 2.05%

Native American : 0.46%

Other race : 0.33%

Asian : 0.22%

Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander : 0%
